QueryViewSpec.Name: D2 Biz Process Records Not Processed Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: Displays the D2 Biz Process Records Not Processed
QueryViewSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL: select sponsor.LOOKUPID as SPONSORLOOKUPID ,child.LOOKUPID as CHILDLOOKUPID --,CHILDID --,REVENUESPLITID ,r.LOOKUPID as REVENUELOOKUPID --,SPONSORID ,NTD ,PAYMETHOD ,ISEFTDECLINED ,NUMBEROFMONTHSPASTDUE ,SPONSORSHIPID ,SPONSORSHIPREVENUEID from dbo.USR_D2_RECORDS_NOT_PROCESSED left join dbo.CONSTITUENT sponsor on sponsor.ID = SPONSORID left join dbo.CONSTITUENT child on child.ID = CHILDID left join dbo.revenuesplit rs on rs.ID = REVENUESPLITID left join dbo.revenue r on r.ID = rs.REVENUEID
